#summary What has changed between releases.
#labels Featured

If you have a feature request or found a bug, please [http://code.google.com/p/chrome-extension-google-apps-script-resources/issues/list submit an issue].

= Versions =

== Version 1.2 (2011-01-15) ==

  * Tooltip to icon bar icon added (issue #3)
  * Icon for the extensions page in chrome defined (issue #4)
  * Possibility to define how to open links added (issue #5)
  * Popup will now be closed after link click (issue #6)

== Version 1.1 (2011-01-11) ==

  * Internationalization (i18n) added (issue #1)
  * German translation added (issue #2)

== Version 1.0 (2011-01-10) ==

  * Initial version.
